name: The Great Kat and the Ancient Curse
name_original: The Great Kat and the Ancient Curse
description:
The Great Kat and the Ancient Curse.

You are the good witch, Katherine. An ancient curse has been released onto the town, taking over the minds of the fearsome warriors and turning the rest into horrible, disfigured creatures. It's your job to collect all the ingredients necessary to lift the curse!

Katherine has the ability to turn into "The Great Cat", a powerful feline form that fires massive fireballs! However doing this will require sacrificing some of your health!

Kill the abominations around town, sacrifice their bodies to obtain your ingredients (and heal yourself), and find a few special items to finish the spell and save the city!

Controls:

WASD - movement

Spacebar - switch to/from "The Great Cat"

Left Mouse Button - attack

Right Mouse Button - sacrifice body

Esc - open up menu and checklist
